formData.classroomName: Introduction to Bitcoin, Crypto and Blockchain
formData.description: Let's discuss Bitcoin and cryptocurrency from the bad (ponzi schemes, fraud, theft) and the good (coordination, soveraignity, quadratic funding)
Let's lear economic basics, supply and demand, some keynesian and autrian theory, some game theory, etc
